article_text:
Heather Truesdall, of London, England, daughter of Reesa Porter, of Boulder, and Jeffrey Truesdall, of Boulder, will marry Dave Smith, of London, son of Jenny and Derek Smith, of Norfolk, England.

Heather graduated from Shining Mountain Waldorf School in Boulder and received a Master of Arts in cello performance from the University of Colorado-Boulder, as well as a Master of Arts in music leadership from Guildhall School of Music and Drama in London. She is a musician.

Dave recevied a bachelor's degree in jazz performance from Guildhall School of Music and Drama. He also is a musician.

The couple will marry Aug. 30 in Grand Lake.

article_summary:
Heather Truesdall, of London, England, daughter of Reesa Porter, of Boulder, and Jeffrey Truesdall, of Boulder, will marry Dave Smith, of London, son of Jenny and Derek Smith, of Norfolk, England.
Dave recevied a bachelor's degree in jazz performance from Guildhall School of Music and Drama.
Heather graduated from Shining Mountain Waldorf School in Boulder and received a Master of Arts in cello performance from the University of Colorado-Boulder, as well as a Master of Arts in music leadership from Guildhall School of Music and Drama in London.
The couple will marry Aug. 30 in Grand Lake.
He also is a musician.
